verbs.description: it all right for [ARG0: the bears] to [V: expect] [ARG1: more] [ARG2: from mitch trubisky] [ARGM-LOC: in a big game] the bears arrived thinking they could win a shootout with tom brady and the patriots and left defending mitch trubisky crooked aim in a litmus - test game a franchise quarterback needs to be the reason a team wins and trubisky showed he is n’t that guy yet new england patriots bears soldier field patriots tom brady mitch trubisky kevin white
